A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I have no idea what people are complaining about. Yes\, there are plot holes you can drive a bus through\, nonsensical plot devices\, poor character development and some truly daft moments leaving you wondering why didnt you do x 5 minutes ago. But show me a Star Wars film that didnt have all of that in spades? It was highly entertaining and a brilliant addition to the franchise. Just go see it and ignore the naysayers.
